rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
rules.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any phase.

rules.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

rules.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 3+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1.

rules.when: End of your opponent's Fight Phase.
rules.target: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
rules.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.
